00025 // GENERAL CONSTRUCTOR
00026 
00046 
00047 AircraftLandingProblem::AircraftLandingProblem(MultilayerPerceptron* newMultilayerPerceptron)       
00048 : ObjectiveFunctional(newMultilayerPerceptron)
00049 {
00050    // Control sentence
00051 
00052    int numberOfInputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfInputs();
00053    int numberOfOutputs = multilayerPerceptron->getNumberOfOutputs();
00054 
00055    if(numberOfInputs != 1 || numberOfOutputs != 1)
00056    {
00057       std::cerr << std::endl
00058                 << "Flood Error: AircraftLandingProblem class." << std::endl
00059                 << "AircraftLandingProblem(MultilayerPerceptron*) constructor." << std::endl
00060                 << "Number of inputs and outputs in multilayer perceptron must be 1." << std::endl
00061                 << std::endl;
00062 
00063       exit(1);
00064    }
00065 
00066    pi = 4.0*atan(1.0);                       // pi = 3.1416
00067 
00068    // Aircraft properties
00069 
00070    shortPeriodGain = -0.95;                  // (s-1)
00071    pathTimeConstant = 2.5;                   // (s)
00072    shortPeriodResonantFrequency = 1.0;       // (rad/s)
00073    shortPeriodDampingFactor = 0.5;           // no units
00074 
00075    // Problem parameters
00076 
00077    velocity = 256.0;                         // (ft/s)
00078    landingTime = 20.0;                       // (s)
00079 
00080    // Initial values
00081 
00082    initialAltitude = 100.0;                  // (ft)
00083    initialAltitudeRate = -10.0*1.0;          // (ft/s)
00084    initialPitchAngle = (1.0/velocity)*initialAltitudeRate; 
00085    initialPitchAngleRate = 0.0;              // (rad/s)
00086 
00087    // Weight factors for the state variables in all the trajectory
00088 
00089    pitchAngleRateWeight = 1.0;
00090    pitchAngleWeight = 1.0;
00091    altitudeRateWeight = 1.0;
00092    altitudeWeight = 1.0;
00093 
00094    // Weight factors for the states variables at the landing time
00095 
00096    landingPitchAngleRateWeight = 1.0;
00097    landingPitchAngleWeight = 1.0;
00098    landingAltitudeRateWeight = 1.0;
00099    landingAltitudeWeight = 1.0;
00100 
00101    // Weight factor for the control variable
00102 
00103    elevatorWeight = 1.0;
00104 
00105    // Integration stuff
00106 
00107    tolerance = 1.0e-9;
00108    initialSize = 1000;
00109 
00110    ordinaryDifferentialEquations.setTolerance(tolerance);
00111    ordinaryDifferentialEquations.setInitialSize(initialSize);
00112 }
00113

00133 
00134 AircraftLandingProblem::AircraftLandingProblem(void) : ObjectiveFunctional()
00135 {
00136    pi = 4.0*atan(1.0);                       // pi = 3.1415
00137     
00138     shortPeriodGain = -0.95;                  // (s-1)
00139    pathTimeConstant = 2.5;                   // (s)
00140    shortPeriodResonantFrequency = 1.0;       // (rad/s)
00141    shortPeriodDampingFactor = 0.5;           // no units
00142 
00143    velocity = 256.0;                         // (ft/s)
00144    landingTime = 20.0;                       // (s)
00145 
00146    initialPitchAngleRate = 0.0;              // (rad/s)
00147    initialAltitude = 100.0;                  // (ft)
00148    initialAltitudeRate = -20.0*1.0;              // (ft/s)
00149     initialPitchAngle = (1.0/velocity)*initialAltitudeRate; 
00150 
00151    tolerance = 1.0e-12;
00152    initialSize = 1000;
00153    
00154    pitchAngleRateWeight = 1.0;
00155    pitchAngleWeight = 1.0;
00156    altitudeRateWeight = 1.0;
00157    altitudeWeight = 1.0;
00158 
00159    landingPitchAngleRateWeight =1.0;
00160    landingPitchAngleWeight =1.0;
00161    landingAltitudeRateWeight = 1.0;
00162    landingAltitudeWeight = 1.0;
00163    
00164    elevatorWeight = 1.0;
00165 }

00447 // double calculatePitchAngleRateDot(double, double, double, double, double) method
00448 
00458 
00459 double AircraftLandingProblem::calculatePitchAngleRateDot(double time, 
00460 double pitchAngleRate, double pitchAngle, double altitudeRate, double altitude)
00461 {
00462    double pitchAngleRateDot = 0.0;
00463 
00464    double elevatorDeflection = 0.0;
00465 
00466    Vector<double> input(1), output(1);
00467 
00468    input[0] = time;
00469    output = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutput(input);
00470 
00471     if(output[0] < ((-35.0/360.0)*(2.0*pi)))
00472     {
00473       elevatorDeflection = ((-35.0/360.0)*(2.0*pi));
00474     }
00475     else if(output[0] > ((15.0/360.0)*(2.0*pi)))
00476     {
00477       elevatorDeflection = ((15.0/360.0)*(2.0*pi));        
00478     }
00479     else
00480     {
00481       elevatorDeflection = output[0];
00482     }
00483 
00484    double b11 = 1.0/pathTimeConstant 
00485               - 2.0*shortPeriodDampingFactor*shortPeriodResonantFrequency;
00486 
00487    double b12 = (2.0*shortPeriodDampingFactor*shortPeriodResonantFrequency) / pathTimeConstant
00488               - pow(shortPeriodResonantFrequency, 2.0)
00489               - 1.0/( pow(pathTimeConstant,2.0));
00490 
00491    double b13 = 1.0/(velocity*pow(pathTimeConstant,2.0))
00492               - ( 2.0*shortPeriodDampingFactor*shortPeriodResonantFrequency) / (velocity*pathTimeConstant)   
00493               + ( pow(shortPeriodResonantFrequency,2.0) / velocity );
00494 
00495    double c1 = pow(shortPeriodResonantFrequency,2.0)*shortPeriodGain*pathTimeConstant;
00496 
00497    pitchAngleRateDot = b11*pitchAngleRate + b12*pitchAngle + b13*altitudeRate
00498                      + c1*elevatorDeflection;
00499 
00500    return(pitchAngleRateDot);
00501 }
00502

00504 // double calculatePitchAngleDot(double, double, double, double, double) method
00505 
00515 
00516 double AircraftLandingProblem::calculatePitchAngleDot(double time, 
00517 double pitchAngleRate, double pitchAngle, double altitudeRate, double altitude)
00518 {
00519    double pitchAngleDot = pitchAngleRate;
00520 
00521    return(pitchAngleDot);
00522 }
00523 
00524 
00525 // double calculateAltitudeRateDot(double, double, double, double, double) method
00526 
00536 
00537 double AircraftLandingProblem::calculateAltitudeRateDot(double time, 
00538 double pitchAngleRate, double pitchAngle, double altitudeRate, double altitude)
00539 {
00540    double altitudeRateDot = 0.0;
00541 
00542    double b32 = velocity/pathTimeConstant;
00543 
00544    double b33 = -(1.0/pathTimeConstant);
00545 
00546    altitudeRateDot = b32*pitchAngle + b33*altitudeRate;
00547 
00548    return(altitudeRateDot);
00549 }
00550

00565 double pitchAngleRate, double pitchAngle, double altitudeRate, double altitude)
00566 {

00569    return(altitudeDot);
00570 }

00588 // double getPitchAngleGoal(double) method
00589 
00594 
00595 double AircraftLandingProblem::getPitchAngleGoal(double time)
00596 {   
00597    double pitchAngleGoal = 0;
00598     
00599    if(time==20.0)
00600    {
00601       pitchAngleGoal = (1.0/180.0)*pi;  
00602    }
00603     
00604    return(pitchAngleGoal);
00605 }
00606 
00607 
00608 // double getAltitudeRateGoal(double) method
00609 
00614 
00615 double AircraftLandingProblem::getAltitudeRateGoal(double time)
00616 {
00617    double altitudeRateGoal = 0.0;
00618 
00619    if( time <= 15.0 ) 
00620    {
00621       altitudeRateGoal = -20.0 * exp(-0.2 * time);   
00622    } 
00623    else if( time > 15.0 ) 
00624    {
00625       altitudeRateGoal = -1.0;   
00626    }
00627 
00628    return(altitudeRateGoal);
00629 }
00630 
00631 
00632 // double getAltitudeGoal(double) method
00633 
00638 
00639 double AircraftLandingProblem::getAltitudeGoal(double time)
00640 {
00641    double altitudeGoal = 0.0;
00642    
00643    if( time <= 15.0  ) 
00644    {
00645       altitudeGoal = 100.0 * exp(-0.2 * time);   
00646    } 
00647    else if( time > 15.0 ) 
00648    {
00649       altitudeGoal = 20.0 - time;   
00650    }
00651 
00652    return(altitudeGoal);
00653 }

00839 // void printWeights(void) method
00840 
00843 
00844 void AircraftLandingProblem :: printWeights(void)
00845 {
00846     std::cout << "Altitude: " << getInitialAltitude() << std::endl;
00847 
00848     std::cout << "Pitch Angle Rate Weight Factor         : " 
00849               << getPitchAngleRateWeight(0.0) << std::endl;
00850               
00851     std::cout << "Pitch Angle Weight Factor              : " 
00852               << getPitchAngleWeight(0.0) << std::endl;              
00853     
00854     std::cout << "Altitude Rate Weight Factor            : " 
00855               << getAltitudeRateWeight(0.0) << std::endl;              
00856               
00857     std::cout << "Altitude Weight Factor                 : " 
00858               << getAltitudeWeight(0.0) << std::endl;              
00859 
00860     std::cout << "Landing Pitch Angle Rate Weight Factor : " 
00861               << getLandingPitchAngleRateWeight() << std::endl;                  
00862 
00863     std::cout << "Landing Pitch Angle Weight Factor      : " 
00864               << getLandingPitchAngleWeight() << std::endl;                  
00865 
00866     std::cout << "Landing Altitude Rate Weight Factor    : " 
00867               << getLandingAltitudeRateWeight() << std::endl;                  
00868 
00869     std::cout << "Landing Altitude Weight Factor         : " 
00870               << getLandingAltitudeWeight() << std::endl;                  
00871 
00872     std::cout << "Elevator Weight Factor                 : " 
00873               << getElevatorWeight() << std::endl;    
00874 }
00875 
00876 
00877 // double calculateEvaluation(void) method
00878 
00880 
00881 double AircraftLandingProblem::calculateEvaluation()
00882 {
00883     // Control sentence 
00884 
00885    if(multilayerPerceptron == NULL)
00886    {
00887       std::cerr << std::endl
00888                 << "Flood Error: AircraftLandingProblem class." << std::endl
00889                 << "double calculateEvaluation(void) method." << std::endl
00890                 << "Pointer to multilayer perceptron object cannot be NULL." << std::endl
00891                 << std::endl;
00892       
00893       exit(1);
00894    }
00895 
00896    // Increment number of performance evaluations
00897 
00898    numberOfEvaluations++;
00899 
00900    // Evaluate performance
00901 
00902    double evaluation = 0.0;
00903 
00904    Vector<double> input(1), output(1);
00905 
00906    // Solve state equations 
00907 
00908    Vector<double> time;
00909 
00910    Vector<double> pitchAngleRate;
00911    Vector<double> pitchAngle;
00912    Vector<double> altitudeRate;
00913    Vector<double> altitude;
00914        
00915    int numberOfPoints = ordinaryDifferentialEquations.calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral(*this, 
00916    time, pitchAngleRate, pitchAngle, altitudeRate, altitude,
00917    &AircraftLandingProblem::calculatePitchAngleRateDot,
00918    &AircraftLandingProblem::calculatePitchAngleDot,
00919    &AircraftLandingProblem::calculateAltitudeRateDot,
00920    &AircraftLandingProblem::calculateAltitudeDot,
00921    0.0, 20.0, 
00922    initialPitchAngleRate, initialPitchAngle, 
00923    initialAltitudeRate, initialAltitude);
00924        
00925    // Calculate performance 
00926 
00927    Vector<double> integrand(numberOfPoints);
00928 
00929    Vector<double> altitudeGoal(numberOfPoints);
00930    Vector<double> elevatorDeflection(numberOfPoints);
00931 
00932    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfPoints; i++)
00933    {   
00934       altitudeGoal[i] = getAltitudeGoal(time[i]);
00935             
00936       // Elevator deflection
00937       
00938       input[0] = time[i];
00939       output = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutput(input);
00940       
00941       if(output[0] < ((-35.0/360.0)*(2.0*pi)))
00942       {
00943          elevatorDeflection[i] = ((-35.0/360.0)*(2.0*pi));
00944       }
00945       else if(output[0] > ((15.0/360.0)*(2.0*pi)))
00946       {
00947          elevatorDeflection[i] = ((15.0/360.0)*(2.0*pi));        
00948       }
00949       else
00950       {
00951          elevatorDeflection[i] = output[0];
00952       }   
00953 
00954       // Integrand
00955 
00956       integrand[i] = 1.0e-6*pow(altitudeGoal[i]-altitude[i], 2.0) + 1.0e-12*pow(elevatorDeflection[i], 2.0);                       
00957    }
00958 
00959    evaluation = integrationOfFunctions.calculateSimpsonIntegral(time, integrand);   
00960         
00961    evaluation += 1.0e-3*pow((1.0*pi/180.0)-pitchAngle[numberOfPoints-1], 2.0 );
00962    evaluation += 1.0e-6*pow(altitude[numberOfPoints-1], 2.0);
00963    
00964    return(evaluation);
00965 }
00966 
00967 
00968 // void saveResults(char*) method
00969 
00987 
00988 void AircraftLandingProblem::saveResults(char* filename)
00989 {
00990    Vector<double> input(1), output(1);
00991    
00992    double elevatorDeflection = 0.0;
00993 
00994    // Solve state equations 
00995 
00996    Vector<double> time;
00997 
00998    Vector<double> pitchAngleRate;
00999    Vector<double> pitchAngle;
01000    Vector<double> altitudeRate;
01001    Vector<double> altitude;
01002 
01003    int numberOfPoints = 
01004     ordinaryDifferentialEquations.calculateRungeKuttaFehlbergIntegral(*this, 
01005    time, pitchAngleRate, pitchAngle, altitudeRate, altitude,
01006    &AircraftLandingProblem::calculatePitchAngleRateDot,
01007    &AircraftLandingProblem::calculatePitchAngleDot,
01008    &AircraftLandingProblem::calculateAltitudeRateDot,
01009    &AircraftLandingProblem::calculateAltitudeDot,
01010    0.0, landingTime, 
01011    initialPitchAngleRate, initialPitchAngle, 
01012    initialAltitudeRate, initialAltitude);
01013 
01014    Vector<double> pitchAngleRateGoal(numberOfPoints);
01015    Vector<double> pitchAngleGoal(numberOfPoints);
01016    Vector<double> altitudeRateGoal(numberOfPoints);
01017    Vector<double> altitudeGoal(numberOfPoints);
01018 
01019    std::fstream file; 
01020 
01021    file.open(filename, std::ios::out);
01022 
01023    if(!file.is_open())
01024    {
01025       std::cout << std::endl
01026                 << "Cannot open aircraft landing problem results data file."  << std::endl;
01027       
01028       exit(1);
01029    }
01030    else
01031    {
01032       if(display)
01033       { 
01034          std::cout << std::endl
01035                     << "Saving aircraft landing problem results to data file..." << std::endl;
01036       }
01037    }
01038 
01039    // File header
01040 
01041    file << "%  1 - Time" << std::endl
01042         << "%  2 - Pitch angle rate goal" << std::endl
01043         << "%  3 - Pitch angle goal" << std::endl
01044         << "%  4 - Altitude rate goal" << std::endl
01045         << "%  5 - Altitude goal" << std::endl
01046         << "%  6 - Pitch angle rate" << std::endl
01047         << "%  7 - Pitch angle" << std::endl
01048         << "%  8 - Altitude rate" << std::endl
01049         << "%  9 - Altitude" << std::endl
01050         << "% 10 - Elevator deflection" << std::endl << std::endl 
01051         << "% Weight Factors" << std::endl << std::endl
01052         << "% Pitch Angle Rate Weight Factor         = " << getPitchAngleRateWeight(0.0) << std::endl
01053         << "% Pitch Angle Weight Factor              = " << getPitchAngleWeight(0.0) << std::endl
01054         << "% Altitude Rate Weight Factor            = " << getAltitudeRateWeight(0.0) << std::endl
01055         << "% Altitude Weight Factor                 = " << getAltitudeWeight(0.0) << std::endl
01056         << "% Landing Pitch Angle Rate Weight Factor = " << getLandingPitchAngleRateWeight() << std::endl
01057         << "% Landing Pitch Angle Weight Factor      = " << getLandingPitchAngleWeight() << std::endl
01058         << "% Landing Altitude Rate Weight Factor    = " << getLandingAltitudeRateWeight() << std::endl
01059         << "% Landing Altitude Weight Factor         = " << getLandingAltitudeWeight() << std::endl
01060         << "% Elevator Weight Factor                 = " << getElevatorWeight() << std::endl
01061         << std::endl;
01062 
01063    // File data
01064 
01065    for(int i = 0; i < numberOfPoints; i++)
01066    {            
01067       pitchAngleRateGoal[i] = getPitchAngleRateGoal(time[i]);
01068       pitchAngleGoal[i] = getPitchAngleGoal(time[i]);
01069       altitudeRateGoal[i] = getAltitudeRateGoal(time[i]);
01070       altitudeGoal[i] = getAltitudeGoal(time[i]);
01071 
01072       input[0] = time[i];
01073       output = multilayerPerceptron->calculateOutput(input);
01074 
01075       if(output[0] < ((-35.0/360.0)*(2.0*pi)))
01076       {
01077          elevatorDeflection = ((-35.0/360.0)*(2.0*pi));
01078       }
01079       else if(output[0] > ((15.0/360.0)*(2.0*pi)))
01080       {
01081          elevatorDeflection = ((15.0/360.0)*(2.0*pi));        
01082       }
01083       else
01084       {
01085          elevatorDeflection = output[0];
01086       }
01087 
01088       file << time[i] << " " 
01089            << pitchAngleRateGoal[i] << " "
01090            << pitchAngleGoal[i] << " "
01091            << altitudeRateGoal[i] << " "
01092            << altitudeGoal[i] << " "
01093            << pitchAngleRate[i] << " "
01094            << pitchAngle[i] << " "
01095            << altitudeRate[i] << " "
01096            << altitude[i] << " "
01097            << elevatorDeflection << std::endl;   
01098    }  
01099 
01100    file.close();
01101 }
01102 
01103 }
